about_the_game:
Game Overview

"Just Another Endless Runner" offers a fresh and engaging take on the endless runner genre. Players are thrust into an action-packed, fast-paced world where reflexes are key, and every decision counts. Traverse an ever-changing landscape, dodge obstacles, and collect power-ups to push your limits and achieve new high scores. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned runner, this game offers something for everyone, with both challenging gameplay and stunning visuals.

Why Play "Just Another Endless Runner"?

This game is designed for quick, fun, and replayable sessions, perfect for those moments when you want to jump into a fast-paced challenge or aim for that new personal best. With stunning graphics, intuitive controls, and a competitive edge, "Just Another Endless Runner" is a must-play for fans of the genre or anyone looking for an exciting gaming experience on the go.

name: Just Another Endless Runner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel I5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 2GB/Radeon RX 6300
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel I7/AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 4GB/Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: "Just Another Endless Runner" challenges players to run through dynamic environments, dodging obstacles and collecting power-ups. With changing weather, a procedurally generated forest path, and a competitive leader-board, every run feels fresh and exciting. How far can you go?
